Articles.Content: When opening the saved craft menu in the VAB/SPH,  it stops loading after the auto-saved ship. That is, everything that comes before it alphabetically shows up, but the progress bar freezes and I cant actually select anything. It's even worse at the launch pad, where no craft show up at all and I can't even back out of the menu. I've tried restarting the console and loading a previous save. Help.
